channel.title: Shops Disconnecting?
channel.description:
I have had this problem before, but too lazy to post. Anyway, I have had some NPC shops for a while, that just randomly decide to not work. They have worked, but now, when you trade them, they disconnect you. Don't know how to fix. Any help will work.
Thanks, Inferno.

item.title: Shops Disconnecting?
item.dc:creator: @ilovelamp ilovelamp
item.description:
@ilovelamp wrote:

I had this same problem. but it was for only one shop.
Try changing the NPC Id, then try and split the shop into 2, and if all else fails ask jesus

Read full topic

item.title: Shops Disconnecting?
item.dc:creator: @tajkillerscape tajkillerscape
item.description:
@tajkillerscape wrote:

I don’t know how to fix it but probably if you click talk on them they will open up what they have for trade.

Read full topic
